entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level rising to 800 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
